scripts.build: npm run init && (cd npm; npm run build) && (cd jvm; mvn package)
scripts.init: npm run winOs-init32 && npm run winOs-init64 && npm run init-npm && npm run init-jvm
scripts.winOs-init32: test -f "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\git\\bin\\bash.exe" && (echo "32bit installation Found"; npm config set script-shell "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\git\\bin\\bash.exe") || echo "32bit NOT-Found"
scripts.winOs-init64: test -f "C:\\Program Files\\git\\bin\\bash.exe" && (echo "64bit installation Found"; npm config set script-shell "C:\\Program Files\\git\\bin\\bash.exe") || echo "64bit NOT-Found"
